name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PaperPop - Impact Factor & Ranking Viewer on PubMed, Google Scholar, etc.
name.zh_CN: 文献泡泡 - PubMed、Google学术、知网等多站点期刊影响因子与排名

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display journal impact factors, categories, and rankings with one-click sorting and Excel export.
short.zh_CN: 显示期刊影响因子、分区等级，一键排序和导出Excel

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you encounter any issues or have feature suggestions during use, feel free to leave a message in the comments section 💬～

V1.2.1
- Added support for three new sites: Web of Science, ScienceDirect, Engineering Village;

V1.2
- Supports 1-click export of Google Scholar and PubMed list data, including journal impact factors, to Excel.

V1.1
- Support sorting in Google Scholar by impact factor and citation count, and in PubMed by impact factor.

V1.0
- PaperPop displays essential journal insights, including current impact factor, 5-year impact factor, ranking, and classification, as you browse academic sites—quick and clear.

- Supported Sites: PubMed, CNKI, Google Scholar, Baidu Scholar, and Cloud Library(yuntsg.com).
- Supported Rankings: Peking University Core Journals, CCF Recommended Conferences and Journals, CSSCI Journals, and SWJTU Journal Classification.
- Supported Categories: Journal Citation Reports and CAS Divisions.
- Quick Look-up: For unsupported sites, simply enter the journal name in the extension window.
- Customizable Settings: Choose where to enable the extension and which metrics to display.
- Fast, Secure, Silent: Runs entirely within your browser, with no external internet requests, adding no load or blocking risks to visited sites.
long.zh_CN:
使用过程中如遇问题或功能建议，欢迎评论区留言💬～

V1.2.1
- 新增支持三个站点：Web of science, ScienceDirect, Engineering Village；

V1.2
- 支持将Google学术、PubMed列表数据含期刊影响因子等一键导出Excel

V1.1
- Google学术、PubMed支持按影响因子和引用次数排序；

V1.0
- 在您浏览学术站点时，PaperPop 文献泡泡会自动显示期刊的当前影响因子、5年影响因子、期刊分区和等级等关键信息，简洁明了。

- 【支持站点】：PubMed、知网、Google 学术、百度学术、智慧云图书馆；
- 【支持排名】：中文核心期刊（北京大学）、中国计算机学会推荐的国际会议和期刊、中文社科引文索引及扩展、西南交大期刊分级；
- 【支持分区】：Journal Citation Reports 分区和中科院文献情报中心期刊分区；
- 【快速查询】：对暂不支持的站点，可在插件弹窗中直接输入期刊名称进行查询；
- 【自定义配置】：自由选择启用站点和显示的扩展信息；
- 【极速、安全、静默】：完全在浏览器内部运行，无需登录，无外部网络请求，不增加站点负担，也不触发屏蔽或使用量告警；
